name: jCaBaRe - Case Based Reasoning for Java
short_description:
jCaBaRe is a easy to use and easy to extend Case Based Reasoning API for Java.
You can select features of a case (attributes of a Java object), give weights to each one and retrieve a collection of similar cases in a given threshold.
